entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this morning then west 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023
